files.res/layout/activity_main.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_photo_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/upload_photo"/>
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/edit_intro_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="@string/edit_intro"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/price_text"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/price"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/comment_like_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/comment_like"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.res/layout/activity_upload_photo.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".UploadPhotoActivity">
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/photo_image_view"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_photo_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/upload_photo"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.res/layout/activity_edit_intro.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".EditIntroActivity">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/edit_intro_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="@string/edit_intro"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/save_intro_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/save_intro"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.res/layout/activity_set_price.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".SetPriceActivity">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/price_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="@string/price"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/save_price_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/save_price"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.res/layout/activity_comment_like.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".CommentLikeActivity">
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/comment_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/like"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.res/values/strings.xml:
<resources>
    <string name="upload_photo">上传照片</string>
    <string name="edit_intro">编辑文字介绍</string>
    <string name="price">设定价格</string>
    <string name="comment_like">评论点赞</string>
    <string name="upload_photo_success">照片上传成功</string>
    <string name="edit_intro_success">文字介绍编辑成功</string>
    <string name="set_price_success">价格设定成功</string>
</resources>
files.AndroidManifest.xml:
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.example.dtxrestaurant"
    android:versionCode="1"
    android:versionName="1.0">
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA"/>
    <application
        android:allowBackup="true"
        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
        android:label="@string/app_name"
        android:supportsRtl="true"
        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
        <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
            <intent-filter>
                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN"/>
                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER"/>
            </intent-filter>
        </activity>
        <activity android:name=".UploadPhotoActivity"/>
        <activity android:name=".EditIntroActivity"/>
        <activity android:name=".SetPriceActivity"/>
        <activity android:name=".CommentLikeActivity"/>
    </application>
</manifest>
